thread.title: MASTERGREG

author: MASTERGREG
title: MASTERGREG
text:
B & H IS PUTTING THE COMPETITION TO THE CURB WHEN IT COMES TO CUSTOMER SERVICE + PRESENTING AN EASY + EXTREMELY WELL ORGANIZED WEB SITE. WITH NO NONSENSE OR B.S. OR ANY FAKE COME ONS THAT ATTEMPT TO LEAD YOU ASTRAY...
THEY PRESENT PRODUCTS THEY THINK YOU WANT IN A VARIETY OF PRICE RANGES WHILE ATTEMPTING TO KEEP ONLY THE TRUELY GOOD PRODUCTS AVAILABLE + DISCONTINUING ANY PRODUCTS THAT ARE NOT VALID.
THEY REALLY MAKE SURE YOU KNOW WHAT YOU NEED + HAVE THE FACTS TO MAKE A GOOD PURCHASE AHEAD OF TIME..
GREAT WORK I WISH THE OFFERED SHOES IN MY SIZE:::=}}}
